Package Control

Class StaffMgr

java.lang.Object
Control.PersonMgr
Control.StaffMgr
public class StaffMgr
extends PersonMgr
This is a controller for all staff module functions.
Functionality includes:
  • Login/logout
  • Movie Listingsd (Create, update and remove)
  • Cinema Showtimes (Create, update and remove)
  • Configure system settings (Ticket Prices and holidays)
Author:
SS3 Group 8
See Also:
StaffInterface

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static StaffMgr getInstance()
      Gets a staff controller
      If staff controller has not been created yet, create a new staff controller then return it
      Returns:
      Staff Controller

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.util.ArrayList<Movie> movies, java.util.ArrayList<Booking> bookings, java.util.ArrayList<MovieShowing> movieShowings, java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Date> holidays, java.util.ArrayList<Cineplex> cineplexes)
      Loads relevant data into this instance of MovieGoerMgr
      Initializes the following data:
      • Holidays
      • Movies
      • Bookings
      • Showtimes
      • Cineplexes
      Parameters:
      holidays - ArrayList of the holiday dates
      movies - ArrayList of all movie information
      bookings - ArrayList of booking records
      movieShowings - ArrayList of showtimes
      cineplexes - ArrayList of cineplexes

    • createMovieListing

      public void createMovieListing()
      Creates movie listing Summary of method functionality:
      1. Enter movie title
      2. Sets show status (i.e. Coming Soon)
      3. Sets type of movie (i.e. Blockbuster)
      4. Enter details of movie
      5. Enter reviews (if any)


      Note:
      If no reviews are entered, an empty ArrayList of reviews is created.

    • updateMovieListing

      public void updateMovieListing()
      Updates movie listing
      Lists all movies, staff selects which movie to update by index
      Functionality includes:
      • Showing Status (i.e. Coming Soon)
      • Type of Movie (i.e. Blockbuster)
      • Synopsis

    • removeMovieListing

      public void removeMovieListing()
      Remove movie listing
      Lists all movies and staff can remove by index.

    • login

      public StaffMgr.LoginFeedback login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Handles staff login.
      • If already logged in, returns ALREADYLOGGEDIN
      • Username and Password match, returns LOGINSUCCESS
      • If Username and Password do not match, returns WRONGUSERNAMEPASSWORD
      Parameters:
      username - Staff username
      password - Staff password
      Returns:
      LoginFeedback (enum)
      See Also:
      MovieGoerMgr.staffLogin()

      Generates sale report
